DOC.brief_summary: To determine the effectiveness of the pre-biotic Bacillus clausii in preventing antibiotic associated diarrhea among hospitalized immunocompetent Filipino children.
DOC.criteria: Clinically stable children with mild to moderate illness admitted for treatment of bacterial infection. Children with unstable medical condition In any form of immunocompromized state With contraindication to take medication Has taken antibiotics for 3 weeks before start of trial. The above information is not intended to contain all considerations relevant to a patient's potential participation in a clinical trial.
